description: red, yellow and black metal bank in the form of a cash register for dimes and nickels; a moving lever on front controls a counting mechanism for totaling coin amount; picture on one side of large bank building
inscription:
Inscription

printed, in black, on back, encircled: [MAR/TOYS]; below this in black: [AMERICAN MADE]; below this, in black: [PATENT NO. 1,816,347/ LOUIS MARKS & CO.,/ 200 FIFTH AVE. NEW YORK, N.Y.]
title: "Get Rich Quick (registering)" still bank
